fullText: Laurence Fishburne, Sam Rockwell, and Darren Criss make David Mamet's profanity-laden 1975 play about small-time crooks planning a burglary feel both contemporary and classical.
dtliExcerpt: Laurence Fishburne, Sam Rockwell, and Darren Criss make David Mamet's profanity-laden 1975 play about small-time crooks planning a burglary feel both contemporary and classical.
